bill.title: Revises provisions relating to education. (BDR 34-525)
bill.description: AN ACT relating to education; revising provisions governing the transmittal of certain reports by the Commission on School Funding; requiring the Department of Education to establish a dashboard to track daily attendance data for pupils; requiring the Superintendent of Public Instruction to appoint a task force to develop a rubric to compare certain metrics concerning pupils; requiring the Superintendent of Public Instruction to appoint a committee on the use of artificial intelligence in education; revising provisions governing the date on which the State Board of Education is required to submit certain reports; revising the terms of certain appointed members of the State Board; and providing other matters properly relating thereto.

history.action: Read first time. Referred to Committee on Education. To printer.
(Pursuant to Joint Standing Rule No. 14.3.1, no further action allowed.)
